PremiumInfoContainer.premium_info_faq_answer_1: Gimi Master ist ein Abonnement, welches die Gimi App auf richtiges Geld upgradet. Es beinhaltet eine Prepaid-Mastercard entworfen fÃ¼r Kinder und ein Konto zum Geldsparen.
PremiumInfoContainer.premium_info_faq_question_2: Wo kann ich die Karte verwenden?
PremiumInfoContainer.premium_info_faq_answer_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE The Gimi Card can be used online, in stores and abroad. Subscribing supporter decides if they want to allow online shopping and ATM withdrawals!
PremiumInfoContainer.premium_info_faq_answer_3: UnterstÃ¼tzer speichern ihre Karten  in der Gimi App. Sie kÃ¶nnen die Gimi Card aufladen oder Ã¼ber die App direkt etwas auf das Konto Ã¼berweisen.
PremiumInfoContainer.premium_info_faq_question_4: Ist mein Kind bereit fÃ¼r eine Karte?
PremiumInfoContainer.premium_info_faq_answer_4: PLZ_TRANSLATE The Gimi Card is designed to give children support from parents and the Gimi app. There's no age limit on the card, but it's popular from 9 years!
PremiumInfoContainer.premium_info_faq_question_5: Was ist das besondere an dieser Karte?
PremiumInfoContainer.premium_info_faq_answer_5: PLZ_TRANSLATE The Gimi Card is more than a card, it also teaches your children smart money habits. The card is connected to both your childâ€™s educational Gimi App and your parent app. We donâ€™t sell your data or advertise in the app, which is why we offer a paid version for users who want to support our mission.
PremiumInfoContainer.premium_info_faq_answer_6: PLZ_TRANSLATE Gimi uses 2-factor authentication to keep your money safe. We use a phone number instead of BankID. With the phone number, your child will set up an app passcode.
